# IAliceToolsOperation.OutputEncoding property

Gets the output encoding.

```csharp
public Encoding OutputEncoding { get; }
```

## Remarks

Some Encoding may not be supported, uses [`IsLibiconvSupported`](../../AliceToolsProxies/AliceToolsProxiesExtensions/IsLibiconvSupported.md) extension method to check.
